jobs.title: Python Developer â€“ Visual AI Model Integration & Web Automation
jobs.shortDescription: Experienced Python developer to implement pre-trained deep learning models into intelligent browser-based automation workflows using image recognition for visual decision-making.
jobs.description: We are looking for an experienced Python developer to implement pre-trained deep learning models (YOLOv5/YOLOv8) into intelligent browser-based automation workflows. The role involves using image recognition outputs to drive visual decision-making, automate user actions, and create robust pipelines that combine AI and web interfaces. This position is ideal for someone who understands both AI inference and real-time automation using Python.
responsibilities: Load and infer from pre-trained computer vision models (object detection, keypoints, segmentation)
Capture and process images/screenshots from dynamic web environments using Python
Analyze model outputs and implement logic to interact with visual elements (click, drag, etc.)
Integrate with browser automation frameworks (such as Selenium, Pyppeteer, or undetected-chromedriver)
Handle asynchronous task execution, proxy rotation, and session management
Write clean, modular, and maintainable Python code with detailed logging and exception handling
Optionally develop lightweight API endpoints using FastAPI or Flask to expose model inference pipelines
requirements: Proficiency with at least one of the following deep learning stacks: YOLOv5 / YOLOv8 (Ultralytics or custom PyTorch models)
OpenCV, NumPy, and Pillow for image preprocessing and analysis
Hands-on experience with browser automation tools: Selenium, Pyppeteer or undetected-chromedriver
Ability to convert model predictions (bounding boxes, segmentation masks, or keypoints) into actionable browser logic
Solid understanding of DOM structures, event-based UI interaction, and visual layout handling
Familiarity with multithreading, asyncio, or task queuing in Python
Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, or related technical discipline
Demonstrated experience building or integrating visual-AI powered tools into practical workflows
preferred: Experience with FastAPI or Flask for serving model inference endpoints
Prior work involving automation of interactive web interfaces or visual feedback loops
Understanding of headless browsers, stealth automation techniques, and anti-bot evasion
Knowledge of proxy configuration and session isolation
